pages.text: A grisly token, snatched from the jaws of a fearsome beast. It thrums with a primal energy, said to bestow uncanny tracking abilities upon those brave enough to harness its power.

A pulsating core, torn from the explosive soul of a Creeper. It still beats with a volatile energy, thrumming with the promise of immense, if unpredictable, power. Rare crafting ingredient, can also be eaten, but beware! It may have consequences.
A delicate relic, plucked from the silent flight of a nocturnal guardian. It whispers secrets of the night sky, promising swiftness and silent passage to those who bear it. .
An amphibious relic, plucked from the webbed foot of a swamp-dweller. It carries whispers of boggy secrets and murky waters, promising elusive agility to its keeper..
A gnarled branch, fallen from the grasp of an ancient Ent. It pulsates with the age-old magic of the forest, promising the wisdom of the trees and the strength of deep roots to its bearer.

A fierce trophy, hewn from the leader of the pack. It exudes a wild, untamed strength, and the eyes seem to follow you with a knowing glare. Keep it close, and perhaps some of that primal ferocity will guard you too.

A fearsome trophy, harvested from the flames of a demon's lair. It crackles with infernal energy, radiating an oppressive heat and hinting at the hellish power it once commanded. Keep it close, and you might just harness some of its fiery wrath.

A grim artifact, taken from the remains of the once-feared Binky. It radiates an eerie aura, whispering tales of past horrors and promising to imbue its wielder with the resilience of those who have faced the darkest fears.
